Interface Board

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBoard, BoardArray1D, BoardArray2D
    public interface Board

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int cell​(int index1, int index2)
      Returns the corresponding cell content of the board.
      boolean Equals​(AbstractBoard otherBoard)
      Returns true if the baords are equal to each other.Last move, number of moves are ignored.
      int getCol()
      Returns the number of column of the board.
      int getRow()
      Returns the number of the row of the board.
      boolean isSolved()
      Returns true if the game is solved.
      char lastMove()
      Returns last move of this board.
      void move​(char move)
      Makes a move on board according to the parameter
      int numberOfMoves()
      Returns the number of moves this board made.

      Reads the game board from file.
      void reset()
      Resets the board to the solution.

      Sets the board to given values.

      Writes the game board to the file.

        Reads the game board from file.

      • writeToFile

        void writeToFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Writes the game board to the file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - is the file name that baord game will be written.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the board to the solution.

      • setSize

        void setSize​(int rowValue,
             int colValue)
        Sets the board to given values.
        Parameters:
        rowValue - represents number of row.
        colValue - represents number of column.

      • move

        Makes a move on board according to the parameter
        Parameters:
        move - indicates the type of the move

      • isSolved

        boolean isSolved()
        Returns true if the game is solved.

      • cell

        int cell​(int index1,
         int index2)
  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the corresponding cell content of the board.
        Parameters:
        index1 - represents the x-axis.
        index2 - represents the y-axis.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the indexes are invalid.

      • Equals

        boolean Equals​(AbstractBoard otherBoard)
        Returns true if the baords are equal to each other.Last move, number of moves are ignored.
        Parameters:
        otherBoard - is the board that will be compared.

      • getCol

        int getCol()
        Returns the number of column of the board.

      • getRow

        int getRow()
        Returns the number of the row of the board.

      • set_game_format

        void set_game_format​(int format)
        Sets game format. 1 represents HW1, 2 represents HW2 format.

      • lastMove

        char lastMove()
        Returns last move of this board. If there is no last move, it returns S.

      • numberOfMoves

        int numberOfMoves()
        Returns the number of moves this board made.
